EmailTemplate.name: Facilitator Interview Notice
EmailTemplate.subject: Scheduling your Atlas Team Facilitator Interview
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Account.First_Name__c} {!Account.Last_Name__c},
We are excited to schedule an interview with you for our Atlas Team Facilitator Program.
Your interview is scheduled for {!Account.Facilitator_Interview_Start_Date_Time__c} and will last approximately 1 hr.
You will receive a separate zoom calendar meeting invite. Please let us know if you do not, or if you need to reschedule.
Let us know any questions at all in the meanwhile. I look forward to speaking with you.
Best, Molly and Atlas Assistance Dogs
